item.title: Ownable Racing Trailer v1.7 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 16, 2025

Ownable Racing Trailer v1.7 ETS2

A trailer for transporting racing cars

– Sold as a separate slot;
– Four trailer options;
– A little tuning and color selection;
– 42 loads.

Credits: Skimo

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Skin Volkswagen Krone ProfiLiner – T-Roc Gold Edition v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 16, 2025

Skin Volkswagen Krone ProfiLiner – T-Roc Gold Edition v1.0 ETS2

The Volkswagen Krone ProfiLiner – T-Roc Gold Edition is a high-quality trailer mod featuring a premium design inspired by the German automotive brand Volkswagen.
This mod showcases the Volkswagen T-Roc in a stunning gold finish, combined with a stylish geometric background for a luxurious and professional look inside the game.

Features:
Realistic Krone ProfiLiner trailer skin with Volkswagen branding
High-quality render of the VW T-Roc in gold
Attractive golden geometric background
Clean and optimized textures for smooth performance
Compatible with game versions 1.30 – 1.57
Fully compatible with Krone DLC
Works perfectly in Single Player

Credits: Trailer Base: KRONE ProfiLiner Skin Design & Rework: LAVENIR DE GAME

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Skin Numilog Krone ProfiLiner Trailer v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 16, 2025

Skin Numilog Krone ProfiLiner Trailer v1.0 ETS2

The Numilog Krone ProfiLiner is a high-quality Algerian mod that brings the authentic design of the Krone ProfiLiner trailer inspired by the famous Algerian transport company NUMILOG.
This mod has been carefully crafted to replicate the real look of the company’s trailers, featuring the original white color scheme and official logo, providing a realistic trucking experience that reflects Algerian logistics identity.

Features:
Realistic and professional Krone ProfiLiner trailer design with NUMILOG branding
High-quality textures and detailed materials
Optimized for smooth performance
Workson most game versions from 1.30 to 1.57
Compatible with Krone DLC
Easy to install and use

Credits: Original and exclusive design by L’AVENIR DE GAME Inspired by the real Algerian transport company NUMILOG

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Skin Numilog Krone ProfiLiner Trailer – Algerian Blue v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 16, 2025

Skin Numilog Krone ProfiLiner Trailer – Algerian Blue v1.0 ETS2

The Numilog Krone ProfiLiner (Blue Edition) is a high-quality Algerian mod that brings the authentic design of the Krone ProfiLiner trailer, inspired by the famous Algerian transport company NUMILOG.
This mod has been carefully crafted to replicate the real look of the company’s trailers, featuring the distinct blue color and the official Numilog logo — providing a realistic and professional trucking experience that reflects Algerian logistics identity.

Features:
Realistic Krone ProfiLiner trailer with Numilog Blue Edition design
High-quality and detailed blue textures
Optimized for smooth performance
Works with most game versions from 1.30 to 1.57
Fully compatible with Krone DLC
Easy to install and activate

Credits: Original and exclusive design by LAVENIR DE GAME Inspired by the real Algerian transport company NUMILOG Elegant blue finish with clean branding

item.title: Skin Guedila Krone ProfiLiner Trailer v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 16, 2025

Skin Guedila Krone ProfiLiner Trailer v1.0 ETS2

Experience a high-quality Algerian-style trailer mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2!
This custom Krone ProfiLiner features the authentic Guedila brand design, inspired by the famous Algerian mineral water company.
The mod offers a clean and realistic look, combining soft pink tones with the original Guedila logo — perfectly crafted for a professional touch.

Features:
Realistic Guedila design on Krone ProfiLiner trailer
Optimized textures for high performance
Works with most ETS2 versions (1.30 – 1.57)
Compatible with other Krone DLCs
Lightweight and easy to install

Credits: Design: L’AVENIR DE GAME Brand Inspiration: Guedila (Algeria)

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
